code: import{useState}from"react";import Logo from"./Logo";import Form from"./Form";import PackingList from"./PackingList";import Stats from"./Stats";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function App(){const[items,setItems]=useState([]);function handleAddItems(item){setItems(items=>[...items,item]);}function handleDeleteItem(id){setItems(items=>items.filter(item=>item.id!==id));}function handleToggleItem(id){setItems(items=>items.map(item=>item.id===id?{...item,packed:!item.packed}:item));}function handleClearList(){const confirmed=window.confirm("Are you sure you want to delete all items?");if(confirmed)setItems([]);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Logo,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form,{onAddItems:handleAddItems}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PackingList,{items:items,onDeleteItem:handleDeleteItem,onToggleItem:handleToggleItem,onClearList:handleClearList}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Stats,{items:items})]});}
